# VyOS SD-WAN Project Instructions

This project creates a comprehensive SD-WAN solution using VyOS for CPE-to-aggregator tunneling.

## Project Structure
- AWS EC2 VyOS Aggregator configuration
- macOS Branch VyOS configuration  
- Terraform automation for AWS deployment
- Windows Hyper-V/VMware setup guides
- Testing and validation scripts

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on VyOS configuration accuracy
- Ensure IPsec tunnel stability
- Validate BGP routing setup
- Test SD-WAN path selection
- Document deployment procedures

## Configuration Standards
- Use consistent IP addressing schemes
- Implement proper security groups
- Follow VyOS best practices
- Include monitoring and health checks
- Provide rollback procedures
